And after laid-back Muneer and critical Rosie seem to have put their tension behind them at Christine's, Ben's determined to take things up a notch as he entertains his guests with his amazing body art, cooking skills and pet crabs

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fridge salesman Gregory serves up a Spanish menu in Peterborough, accompanied by a charm offensive that he hopes will win him the 1,000 prize. Will it work or will the guests give him the cold shoulder?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fiery Brazilian Rosie is confident that her night will be the best of the week in Peterborough. After Gregory used packet mixes, Rosie is determined to show him how to throw a dinner party by making everything from scratch. She's ruffled a few feathers throughout the week with her brutally honest critiques, and her guests, roused for retribution, scour every element of her Brazilian night for any faults, from her samba dancers to her authentic pig-ear stew

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman heads to the inland towns and villages of Almera province in southern Spain to help Candy and Mark find the perfect holiday home before their wedding in six months

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Curious four-month-old terrier puppies Bobo and Lenny start scouting out their new surroundings at the centre. The brother and sister are completely different in looks and personality, but both need a forever home. Meanwhile, the staff bring together 82-year-old Alan and lhasa apso Ruby, both of whom are looking for comfort after losing a loved one

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: A delivery driver is the victim of a carjacking and ends up being dragged along the road. On the M40, 13 stowaway migrants are found in a lorry full of tyres and in need of urgent medical care. A man collapses while having a fit in the middle of a busy road, and a woman experiences uncontrollable spasms in her legs at the stress of losing a child

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency?
programme.desc: One-off special following South Yorkshire Police investigating reports of bullying, from playground brawls and racism in schools, to coercive domestic abuse. Cases featured include a 14-year-old boy hospitalised by a gang in the street, a single vulnerable woman being systematically targeted by local teens in her own home, and a distraught mother watching her 27-year-old son attempting suicide after being bullied at work

programme.title: Le Mans '66 (2019)
programme.desc: Racing car driver and engineer Carroll Shelby is lured out of retirement during the 1960s, in a period where the sport is dominated by Italian companies. Ford Motors are hoping to revive their flagging fortunes by launching a racing division and securing a high-profile win at the prestigious Le Mans 24-hour race. Shelby takes up the challenge of headlining the plan to build a revolutionary new race car, but courts conflict within the company by recruiting unpredictable, short-tempered British driver Ken Miles to take the wheel. Fact-based drama, starring Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal and Caitriona Balfe

programme.title: Andrew: The Problem Prince
programme.desc: The first of two programmes telling the inside story of Prince Andrew's 2019 Newsnight interview with Emily Maitlis and the subsequent chain of events that led to a royal disaster. In the 1980s, Andrew was a Falklands war hero and a national heart-throb, glory years that culminated in his marriage to Sarah Ferguson. But following his departure from the Navy, his image took a turn as his new role as trade envoy proved unsuccessful - and his need to fund a lavish lifestyle and friendship with Jeffrey Epstein eventually prompted the interview that cemented his downfall

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: A nutrition student hoping to meet a man who is open with his feelings finds she is not used to compliments during a date with a football coach, and has to brush up on her flirting. Elsewhere, two diners bond over their shared love of dogs, a farmer presents his date with a gift of beetroot, and a woman discovers she has met her supposedly blind date before

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: The Rothschild's giraffes are expecting a new addition as 12-year-old matriarch Dagmar, whose last calf died after a few days, goes into labour after a 15-month pregnancy. Orang-utan sisters Tuti and Siska, and their baby cousin Kesuma, rebuild their relationship after the trauma of the fire that engulfed their habitat in December 2018, while the keepers set off in pursuit when a blue-throated macaw goes on the run

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Electrician Steve hosts the second night of the competition in Llanelli, Carmarthenshire, and hopes that his menu of lasagne, vegetable soup and homemade wine will impress his guests and win him the 1,000 prize. As the evening goes on, Meic decides to bare all with a revelation that shocks Christine

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Somerset, three rival duos compete to host the best dinner party. Married couple Jacqueline and Stephen host first with their Mediterranean menu. On day two, social media enthusiast Jess and her boyfriend Fred show off their Portuguese cooking. On the last night, Jacqueline, Stephen, Jess and Fred have high expectations for Rob and Simon's culinary skills

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps former firefighter Gary Sheen and his partner Kevin Lambert from Essex find a new home in the Altea region of Spain's Costa Blanca. With a budget of 175,000, the couple are torn between a two-bedroom apartment with jaw-dropping views, or a town house opposite one of their favourite restaurants

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Dave and Debbie Chambers from Redditch, Worcestershire, started their family young, but now their four children have grown up, they've decided to recapture their youth and buy a place in Spain where they can enjoy time in the sun - just the two of them. For their budget of 45,000 Laura Hamilton shows them five apartments in and around the town of Torrevieja, but will any of them be their perfect place?

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Motorbike fan David is keen to move to Almera, but wife Fiona will take some convincing before she leaves Yorkshire. Pilates fan Esther searches for a holiday home in Alicante

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: A derelict building in a French village gets a new lease of life. Meanwhile, in Portugal, a couple dip their toes into their first season as holiday hosts, and in southern France, a very special event takes place in a refurbished chapel

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien continue their mission to repurpose old cast-offs into cash, making an extraordinary find from a Dutch designer in accountant Debbie's lean-to

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Sports fanatic James Cox hosts the first of the week's dinner parties in Northampton, and he is confident that his French-Italian menu will bag him the 1,000 prize. However, some of his guests - Barb Wiles, Donna Harris, Duncan Fielding and Caroline Nash - are left confused by his Vichyssoise soup starter, and the tiramisu causes one of them to choke

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Mother-of-three Donna Harris hosts the second dinner party in Northampton, and hopes that three courses of pure comfort-food will be enough to secure the 1,000 prize. Donna spends almost as much time fixing her make-up as she does preparing the meal, and when guests Duncan Fielding and Caroline Nash discover a secret stash of football shirts, they realise there is more to their hostess than meets the eye

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Part-time actress Caroline Nash is the host on day three of the competition in Northampton, and she hopes that a menu based on her travels will dazzle her guests. However, the night gets off to a shaky start as Donna Harris finds a hair on the side of her goat's cheese salad, while businessman Duncan Fielding seems more interested in goats themselves than the food

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Party-loving Barb Wiles hosts the fourth dinner party in the Northampton area, and hopes her Australian-themed menu will wow her guests and win her the 1,000 prize. However, the competitors are unnerved by her interest in extraterrestrials while snooping around her bedroom, and things go from bad to worse when a seafood starter and undercooked chicken result in tears at the dinner table

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Attention-loving businessman and keen cricketer Duncan Fielding takes centre stage in hosting the final dinner party from Northampton. He creates a menu based on the story of his life - which is full of surprises and full of spice - but it proves a challenge for three of his guests, who like their food mild. His main feature is a chicken and reindeer curry, and the table is impressed to discover that he runs a community pub from the bottom of his garden

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman travels to Peyia in western Cyprus to help Pauline and Chris find their perfect holiday home on a budget of 80,000

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: The charity version of the popular baking show returns, and with Noel Fielding on paternity leave, Matt Lucas is presenting on his own. In previous editions, comedian Tom Allen has stepped in to co-present - but today he is showing off his baking skills as one of the contestants, alongside Star Wars actress Daisy Ridley, comedian Rob Beckett and singer Alexandra Burke. To impress Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, the celebrities serve up millionaire shortbread, a fruity tart and their pet hates in cake form in the showstopper

programme.title: Sarah Beeny's New Life in the Country
programme.desc: Sarah and Graham turn their attention to the family room and how best to use the empty space downstairs. They draw inspiration from the Chinese bedroom at Longleat House and the plant-based textiles and natural dyes on display at London Fashion Week. Sarah realises that she can't carry on working in random parts of the house, so comes up with a plan to seamlessly weave her workspace into the living area.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: A nutrition student hoping to meet a man who is open with his feelings finds she is not used to compliments during a date with a football coach, and has to brush up on her flirting. Elsewhere, two diners bond over their shared love of dogs, a farmer presents his date with a gift of beetroot, and a woman discovers she has met her supposedly blind date before

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Smith (2005)
programme.desc: An outwardly bored suburban couple lead double lives as professional assassins, both unaware of their partner's secret. When they are hired to kill each other, the deadly situation puts some much-needed excitement back into their stale relationship. Comedy adventure, starring Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn and Adam Brody

programme.title: Celebrity Hunted
programme.desc: With just 48 hours till extraction, Saffron and Bobby take a risk and go solo. Nik and Eva continue to taunt the hunters with a postcard from the Welsh coast but their route to the extraction point is nerve-wracking. Hunter HQ use every trick they have in the final push to catch the celebrities before they are extracted and tensions rise with close calls, a motorway pursuit and a desperate foot race as the competition comes to an adrenaline-fuelled end

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer look back at two shows highlighting the way working from home is changing the way many people live. Northampton newlyweds Nikki and Andy both worked from home but their cluttered terrace was close to bursting point. Meanwhile, Amber ran her own fitness classes from her home and wanted somewhere brighter and bigger for her clients. Could Kirstie persuade them to go with her redesigns or would Phil find either couple a much more suitable new place?

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson presents as 22-year-old Ukrainian refugee Mariia enters the studio. Since fleeing the war, the pansexual sex therapist has settled in the UK and is now looking for love with a far-from-average man or woman who can keep up with her in the bedroom. She is followed by 24-year-old Alannah, a content creator from Bristol, who is seeking a forever bloke who can speak the language of love and feels comfortable in his body

programme.title: Send Nudes: Body SOS
programme.desc: Hairdresser Alex wants more muscle and young mum Elle wants to be rid of her stretch marks. Will their life-size post-surgery avatars help make up their minds?

programme.desc: Catching up with a landlord two years after he got his property back from a troublesome tenant who refused to leave the property without a fight. programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Letting agent Paul has a tenant in Lancashire who is behind with his rent and won't return any calls, but the situation is much worse than he could possibly have imagined when he heads into the upstairs bedroom. Harrow enforcement officers Andrew and Ozge are called to a local salon, where a leak from the upstairs flat is disrupting Masi's ability to run her shop. Once the landlord agrees to give them access, they discover terrible conditions and a back yard piled with rubbish

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Following a tip-off, Harrow Enforcement officers are shocked to discover an industrial-scale cannabis farm in a house. The team, along with the police, are determined to find out who has been running this illegal operation. After complaints of all-night parties in a quiet street in Darwen, Lancashire, letting agent Paul pays the revellers a visit. The house is in terrible shape, but the young tenants promise they will clear it all up and keep the noise down. Instead, however, the partying gets worse, with some of the tenants' 'associates' making nasty threats

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Letting agent Paul is called to a houseshare after fighting, cannabis use and partying drive one resident out of the property establishes the source of the problem is a young couple. Harrow housing agents Andrew and Jo find a suspected unlicensed multiple-occupancy house in gross disrepair. After tracking down the landlord, they have mercy and allow him to spend his 5,000 fine on fixing up the property, in the hope he will turn it into a nice family home. But will the he be as good as his word?

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: The housing team in Harrow accompany the police on a raid after receiving reports of dangerous conditions at a home belonging to a notorious slumlord's brother. Lettings agent John wants to turn a former Blackpool hotel into bedsits, but a routine check on the property reveals not only a severely neglected house, but also a drugs den littered with paraphernalia and some of the worst conditions he has ever witnessed

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: A member of the public reports a car veering erratically across the M1 and Karl Jackson and Matt Cooling are sent to investigate. They catch the vehicle up and box it in at traffic lights on a slip road, where the driver, smelling of alcohol, is dragged out and refuses a breathalyser test. Jason Potts is called to a rush-hour crash on the A50, while Alex Boniface takes the lead in the pursuit of a stolen Audi

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Ant Horsley is one of a team of officers pursuing a car suspected of being linked to the drugs trade, and a high-speed and hazardous chase ensues across the Peak District. Ant is also involved when another car is pulled over near a busy junction and its driver is arrested, with police finding what they suspect to be rocks of crack cocaine and heroin parcelled up in the car

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Craig Dawes attends a fatal collision involving a motorcycle and car, where he and Sgt Matt Edwards secure the site for crash investigators, who try to piece together what happened. Sgt Scott Riley spots and follows a biker he thinks looks suspicious, with a computer check indicating the bike is not licensed or insured

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Around 11,000 automatic number plate recognition cameras continually monitor vehicles on Britain's roads. With ANPR readers installed in their patrol cars, it is a valuable tool for Derbyshire's traffic cops, helping them track down dangerous offenders and illegal cars, vans and lorries. Karl Jackson is alerted to a possible disqualified driver when a passing car triggers his ANPR system, but the vehicle fails to stop and a pursuit begins

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A white van fails to stop and leads officers on night-time pursuit round Halifax, but the chase finally comes to an end with devastating consequences. Sophie finds a drunk driver and his girlfriend on a motorway embankment, having abandoned their car, while Clarkie is forced to use pepper spray after a motorist disappears into some bushes

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers swoop on a housing estate searching for suspects involved in a shooting and it needs to be a tightly controlled operation and communication is key between the firearms unit, police helicopters and dog handler Duncan. programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Steve is involved in a dangerous high-speed pursuit of a car stolen in a burglary. Claire and Tom deal with an abusive drunk driver who is clueless about what he has done wrong, rookie Omar tackles a fence-hopping suspect whose antics have left him with a slashed hand, and Steve tracks down a car suspected of being involved in a robbery

programme.desc: Dog handler Duncan attends a midnight stand-off between armed officers and a man who has been seen carrying knives, Suggs pulls over a motorist who appears incapable of telling the truth, and Charlie is given the unenviable task of removing a Range Rover from a ditch after a crash

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: The detective dons various disguises to investigate the deaths of two men who apparently killed each other, his only clue being a fragment of a black-and-white photograph, and comes to suspect the double murder has a connection to a $4million bank robbery. Drama, starring Peter Falk, Ed Begley Jr, Burt Young and Tyne Daly

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A ruthless publisher hires a hitman to kill a best-selling author who has threatened to sign with a rival company - but reckons without the involvement of the cigar-smoking sleuth, who is determined to put the culprit behind bars. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Mickey Spillane, Jack Cassidy and John Chandler

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: After discovering that his best friend and his wife were having an affair, a renowned psychologist uses his unique mind-control powers to commit a bizarre murder - with the help of two pet dogs conditioned to attack when they hear a certain command. Crime drama, with Peter Falk, Nicol Williamson, Frank Aletter and Kim Cattrall

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: The host of a TV show is threatened by a rival, who has discovered evidence of his murky past. The presenter does away with his blackmailer using poisoned cigarettes, and seems to have pulled off the perfect crime - but a certain shabby sleuth is soon on the case and finds a few things that fail to add up. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk and George Hamilton

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: A photographer going through a divorce asks his jeweller uncle to cash in his winning lottery ticket to prevent his wife from getting a share. Seizing the opportunity to keep the money, the greedy older man kills his nephew - but has reckoned without Columbo's intervention. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Rip Torn, Gary Kroeger and Jamie Rose

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: The commandant of a military academy is outraged by the chairman of the board's plans to admit female cadets, so he stages a fatal accident involving a ceremonial cannon. However, Columbo is not fooled by the deception and sets out to expose the truth. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Patrick McGoohan, Tom Simcox and Mark Wheeler

programme.desc: Erich is on trial for the murder of Cindy Strauss, six months on, with the eyes of the world on proceedings. Meanwhile, Terry makes amends for his behaviour after the death of his wife, and Hildy begins reconnecting with her ex-husband Mike - and must confront the temptation to rekindle their romance. Starring Taye Diggs, Kathleen Robertson and Tom Felton

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives link the kidnapping of a girl to her mother's crooked father, and discover that he has misplaced a bag of diamonds he was holding for a colleague - leading them to believe the child's abduction could be an act of revenge. Crime drama, guest starring Ron Eldard, with Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate the case of a man who has been found badly beaten in a strip club's car park, and discover the victim has no recollection of what happened to him. Further inquiries reveal he is embroiled in a bitter separation with his partner - and suggest their teenage child, who wants to undergo gender realignment therapy, could hold the key to the case. Guest starring Alex Kingston

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler's investigation of a robbery leads to his troubled daughter, who broke into a couple's home to use their shower. As he digs deeper into her college life he discovers she has been regularly using drugs and he becomes determined to find and arrest her dealer, and to help her he is forced to reconnect with his estranged mother. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson investigate the death of an astronaut whose body is discovered in the Hudson River. They identify two chief suspects - a drug addict who used the murdered woman's credit card and a man who was barred from the space programme after fighting with the victim. However, a shooting at the precinct jeopardises the detectives' chances of solving the case. Crime drama, guest starring James Brolin, with Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.desc: An NBA star-turned-philanthropist is murdered, and Chloe suspects he may not have been as benevolent as he seemed. Meanwhile, Lucifer investigates his bouts of vulnerability

programme.desc: Gibbs and the team capture computer hacker Ajay Khan, who was recently responsible for hacking into NCIS's supposedly ultra-secure multiple-threat alert centre. They believe he could hold the key to tracking down the most-wanted cyber terrorist in the world, who may be plotting an attack using a bomb containing a strain of the Ebola virus. When Khan refuses to co-operate, Ziva and DiNozzo take him to Guantanamo Bay to be placed with people he had previously betrayed. Guest starring Vik Sahay (Chuck)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the case of a marine who dropped dead while scaling a wall on an assault course, and a fellow soldier reveals that he was heavily involved with an underground fight club, where competitors would battle for cash. Meanwhile, having returned to work after compassionate leave, Vance discovers paperwork and a key in his late wife's effects that lead him to a safety deposit box containing a stash of cash

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While transporting the corpse of Lt Gordon Roth to the morgue, a flat tyre brings Ducky and Jimmy to a halt and they are abducted and taken to a remote cabin - where one of their captors wants the post-mortem to take place. Back at the scene, Abby finds a blood sample that does not belong to the victim, who in fact bore little resemblance to the picture of Roth in his old school yearbook. Guest starring Valerie Cruz (The Following)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate an attack on a nurse, and discover she had been moving house regularly in an effort to evade a stalker who terrorised her with distressing e-mails. The victim regains consciousness, but fails to identify her attacker, leading to the shocking revelation that she may have fabricated the assault story as a way of attracting attention

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the disappearance of a wealthy couple seemingly snatched from their apartment building, but suspicion eventually falls on a man suffering from mental illness - presenting Ross with a tough ethical decision. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach, Benjamin Bratt and Carey Lowell

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis and Briscoe question a disabled boy's bereaved family in an attempt to establish whether his death was a mercy killing or cold-blooded murder, and discover his mother is not as respectable as she makes herself out to be. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis examine the murder of a popular Harlem community leader, while McCoy and Carmichael struggle to prevent a chaotic situation. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston, Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis hunt for the suspected killer of a parolee - but matters are complicated by the discovery that two bounty hunters are also pursuing their quarry. Acclaimed drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis join forces with their Baltimore colleagues to investigate the murder of a government official. It soon emerges that the deceased had been stalked by a man because of her lesbian affair with a married woman, who pleads for her identity to be kept secret. However, an over-zealous attorney embarks on a crusade to make the information public knowledge, going so far as to take the officers to court in an effort to force them to reveal their source - but his interest in the case raises suspicions

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team works with Abigail Borin of the Coast Guard Investigative Service after a highly suspicious explosion and fire on board an oil rig kills a US marine corps reservist. Abby detects malware in the platform's computer systems, while Ducky finds traces on the victim's body that lead to a lawyer who works for the oil company. Back in the office, a prankster is bringing some light relief and although the likeliest suspect is Tony, he denies any involvement. Crime drama, guest starring Diane Neal

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is forced to take a step back from work when his increasingly frail father Jackson begs him to help track down an old friend from the Second World War who does not have long left to live. Meanwhile, the rest of the team investigate the death of a marine sergeant who appears to have been caught in the crossfire during a bungled robbery, but Tony and Tim find evidence the victim may have been targeted. Crime drama, guest starring Ralph Waite (The Waltons), with Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Petty officer Jody Ray is killed by a hit-and-run driver and evidence points to staff sergeant Justin Dunne, whose guilt seems certain when DiNozzo and McGee find him washing a bloodstained knife when they go to arrest him. However, Dunne tells his lawyer Carrie Clark he was miles away in Falls Church at the time - stabbing bookmaker Donny Sullivan to death. Unable to reveal the truth to the NCIS team, Clark decides to check out the alibi herself. Crime drama, guest starring Salli Richardson-Whitfield (A Town Called Eureka)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The officers are called in when Chief Warrant Officer Rafi Nazar is suspected of trying to sell stolen classified Navy software used to pilot combat drones

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A single murder quickly becomes a case involving three bodies, leaving Benson, Stabler and a strip club owner hunting a killer whose motives seemingly stem from a misguided sense of righteousness rather than ordinary criminality. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives call on the help of Dr Warner when the death of a baby leads Stabler and Benson to crack down on a doctor who claims that Aids does not exist and whose dubious practices have cost several lives. Guest starring Babs Olusanmokun (The Unit, Life on Mars)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Munch investigate when a homeless teenager is found burned to death outside a restaurant. programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team tracks the serial killer who has kidnapped Detective Spicer's daughter and is continuing a murderous rampage across California

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU team is called in when a girl goes missing after leaving a nightclub with two men. Both the locals and the police force believe the duo are responsible for her disappearance, and with only 12 hours remaining until they are released from custody, the agents' profiling skills and questioning come to the rescue. Meanwhile, JJ is told she must accept another job despite Hotchner's efforts to prevent her transfer

He explains that a photo-fit released to the media resembles him, and the attacks stopped during a period coinciding with his three-year stint in the navy. Meanwhile, Tony has to take probationary agent Ned Dorneget under his wing

programme.title: NCIS

Back in the US, his widow Ruby tells Gibbs and the team that she had recently received a message from her husband saying he might have upset a few people. Abby retrieves a tiny shard of the sniper's bullet from Ted's helmet and finds that it was made in America

Initial inquiries focus on a petty officer with a history of drug use who may have wanted the doctor to remain silent about his problems. American drama, starring David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team are called in when a Navy reservist returns home to find her husband missing and her living room covered in blood, and make a grim discovery when they find a finger in the bin. Meanwhile, Ziva ruffles a few feathers by insisting on continuing her investigation into the murder of her father, asking for permission to go to Rome on the trail of the chief suspect. Mark Harmon stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A female cop is found stabbed to death in a park alongside a Hispanic male with a near-fatal gunshot wound. Further investigations lead Briscoe and Curtis to a girl who suffered a tough childhood in the care of an abusive father and drug-addicted mother, and her alibi appears to be flimsy at best. Robert Vaughn guest stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A newly appointed judge is knocked over and killed while trying to escape from the tabloid journalist who has been harassing her. programme.title: Law & Order

Jerry Orbach and Sam Waterston star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The investigation into a fatal attack on a semi-retired divorce lawyer by a disgruntled client reveals a network of bribery and corrupt medical practices. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.desc: Police officer Danny Pelham is murdered while staking out the apartment of a wanted man's girlfriend. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.desc: An internal security breach forces NCIS to go into lockdown when a covert listening device is found in a pen belonging to Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter. Guest starring Leslie Hope and Emily Wickersham

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when marine corporal Flegman is found shot to death, and a phone leads them to a hotel room where Gibbs awkwardly stumbles upon his ex-wife Diane Sterling and her FBI agent ex-husband TC Fornell. She had been attempting to call her boyfriend Eddie to break up with him, but somehow Flegman had taken possession of his phone. The team tracks down Eddie's car and discovers a clown nose along with traces of blood and he quickly becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: NCIS

programme.desc: A woman learning about her birth parents asks for help. Carisi and Rollins weigh the risks of taking their relationship public

Crime drama, starring Richard Belzer

Crime drama, guest starring Delroy Lindo

programme.title: London's Weekend
programme.desc: A chance to catch up on the week's headlines and a taste of what to see and do in London this weekend

programme.title: The World's Most Extraordinary Families
programme.desc: What exactly makes a family in today's often complex world? Each episode features three unique families from around the world who live their lives in a less than conventional way

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Number Six believes he can taste freedom - but this could be yet another trick. Conclusion of the cult sci-fi drama, starring Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: Pet Island
programme.desc: The members of Belfast Pug Club throw a Halloween party, a man travels to Italy to buy an Old English sheepdog, and a Donegal couple reveal how their cat became an internet celebrity

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert explores the Norfolk and Suffolk Broads, a protected low-lying wetland of fens and reed beds that is home to one of the UK's largest arachnids, the fen raft spider. Ray also comes across other rare wildlife, including the common crane, the swallowtail butterfly and the Chinese water deer

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh and Jono start building an outdoor wood-fired oven, and it is the perfect excuse for Poh to learn to make pizza the Italian way

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: The garden is nearing completion and Poh and Jono decide to have a party to say thank you to everyone who helped and to christen the new pizza oven

programme.title: Touched by Auschwitz
programme.desc: Feature-length documentary marking the 70th anniversary of the liberation of the concentration camp by Red Army troops. Laurence Rees travels to Jerusalem, Chicago, London, Bavaria, Krakow and Tel Aviv to talk to six survivors, along with their friends and families, who discuss the problems, challenges and triumphs they have experienced since the end of the Second World War. Among those interviewed are Tadeusz, who became a doctor but still had to fight persecution by communists in Poland, and Hermann, who went on to become a successful antiques dealer in Bavaria, but still suffers from recurring nightmares

programme.title: Silent Dust (1949)
programme.desc: A wealthy blind man plans a memorial to his dead son, only to discover he is still alive and has turned to crime. Drama, starring Stephen Murray and Beatrice Campbell

programme.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum (1966)
programme.desc: A conniving slave in ancient Rome tries to win his freedom by helping his lovestruck master romance a virginal courtesan. Comedy musical, starring Zero Mostel, Phil Silvers, Michael Hordern and Buster Keaton

programme.title: Seize the Day (1986)
programme.desc: An honest salesman fallen on hard times return to his New York roots and a reunion with his estranged father. Drama, starring Robin Williams and Glenne Headly

programme.title: Big City Life
programme.desc: The lives of three artistic brothers, a drummer, a sculpture and a DJ

programme.title: Black Hairapy
programme.desc: Short documentary exploring the relationship between Afro hair and identity within the UK Afro-Caribbean community

programme.title: Tabernacle Choir: Music and Words
programme.desc: Music and inspiration for everyday living from one of the world's most acclaimed choirs featuring regular guest artists

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: The Alphans find a case containing a man and his son below the surface of the moon. As the team tries to discover the origins of the pair, Helena makes a shocking discovery. Barbara Bain stars

programme.title: Pet Island
programme.desc: Cat lover Roisin Mills moves house with help from pet behaviour counsellor Jim Stephens, while Chris hopes Elaine Power can change the ways of his Chihuahuas, which have serious issues with regard to toilet training and marking. Plus, the programme heads to Cape Clear Island off the coast of Co Cork to meet Ed Harper, a blind farmer who sings to his goats

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert visits the New Forest in Hampshire, an area of ancient woodlands and heaths originally set aside for hunting by William the Conqueror. Ray explores its wildlife, including fallow deer and ponies, and has a night-time encounter with the elusive nightjar

programme.title: Milner (1994)
programme.desc: A misfit solicitor gets mixed up in something dangerous when a lucrative client's offices go up in flames. Crime drama, starring Mel Smith and Deborah Findlay

programme.title: Car Trouble (1986)
programme.desc: A sexually unsatisfied woman realises her husband's beloved new car means more to him than her. She has a fling with a salesman that accidentally results in the destruction of the precious vehicle, and consumed by rage, the husband plans a murderous revenge. Comedy, starring Julie Walters, Ian Charleson and Stratford Johns

programme.title: Buster (1988)
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama about the life of Buster Edwards, a member of the gang responsible for the Great Train Robbery. Going on the run after the notorious heist, he flees to Mexico with his family. However, his homesick wife struggles to adapt to her new life, leaving the outlaw with a difficult choice. Starring Phil Collins, Julie Walters, Sheila Hancock, Larry Lamb and Ralph Brown

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Having received a tip-off that the Lynstead art collection is about to be burgled, Mannering lies in wait with the police for the thieves

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: The guardian of the temple has passed on and a new Golden Dragon must be Chosen from a brother and sister - Twins born in the Year of the Dragon. Only one will be chosen. Their sibling bond tested

programme.title: Dork Hunters from Outer Space
programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.desc: While searching for a missing crate of valuable antiques, Cordelia discovers a murder and is promptly abducted by the killer

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels

programme.desc: The pilgrims encounter a water monster which has cursed a village to make it completely dry, so Pigsy bravely offers himself as a sacrifice to pacify the beast and return water to the thirsty inhabitants

programme.title: A Child Is Waiting (1963)
programme.desc: A pair of volunteer workers selflessly devote themselves to working at a school for mentally disabled children, but clash over the best approach to teaching an autistic boy neglected by his parents. John Cassavetes' drama, with Burt Lancaster, Judy Garland, Gena Rowlands, Steven Hill and Paul Stewart

programme.title: Time Limit (1957)
programme.desc: A soldier held as a POW during the Korean War confesses to having assisted the enemy during his imprisonment. His superior officers are determined to see him face a court martial as soon as possible, but the investigator assigned to the case suspects he is an innocent man incriminating himself to hide something. Korean War drama, with Richard Widmark and Richard Basehart

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: The Alphans find a case containing a man and his son below the surface of the moon. As the team tries to discover the origins of the pair, Helena makes a shocking discovery. Barbara Bain stars

programme.title: Timewatch
programme.desc: Kate Williams explores the story of the monarch who brought Great Britain into the modern age. She examines Victoria's battle to become Queen, in which she fought against her mother, the Duchess of Kent, who wanted to ascend the throne herself - all at a time when the country was on the brink of revolution

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh and Jono convert an old claw bath into a mushroom garden. Then, once she perfects mushroom risotto, Poh drives to the Barossa Valley to learn tea-blending techniques

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh and her team have expanded their market stall, where the real winner with customers is Poh's paella

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Miriam and John arrive at veterinary surgeon Clare Meade's clinic with Bumbler, who they have been looking after since it turned up on their doorstep unexpectedly

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary series following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: Scumbags
programme.desc: Comedy about a group of Essex gangsters bumbling their way in and out of a life of crime

programme.title: Quest Boxing League
programme.desc: Welcome to the UK's toughest boxing competition, where aspiring young boxers battle it out inside the ring for their chance to be crowned the Quest Boxing League Champion

programme.title: We Are the Lambeth Boys
programme.desc: Members of the Alford House Youth Club in Kennington, London, are seen at school, work and taking part in the club's activities, in this look at youth culture in the 1950s

programme.title: Doorways (2015)
programme.desc: An insecure student takes a job as a bouncer to prove his masculinity, and is taken under the wing of a hardened veteran of the job. As he learns the tricks of the trade, he is drawn on a dangerous journey with murderous consequences that will teach him there is more than one way to be a real man. Drama, starring Steven Murphy and Jonathan Ciardini

programme.desc: Six scientists visit a country house that was once the site of a massacre to investigate psychic disturbances. Horror spoof, starring Kenny Everett, Vincent Price and Pamela Stephenson

programme.desc: A decorated Army major resorts to embezzling mess funds to make ends meet - an act that leaves him facing a court martial, with the evidence stacked against him. To make matters worse, his wife sees the opportunity to get revenge for his wartime affairs by providing false testimony for the prosecution. Courtroom drama, starring David Niven, Margaret Leighton, Noelle Middleton, Laurence Naismith and Clive Morton

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying (1956)
programme.desc: A psychopathic college student is horrified to learn his girlfriend is pregnant, threatening his chances of being accepted into her well-to-do family. In a fit of fury, he murders her and makes it look as if she had committed suicide - only for her sister to show up, taking an uncomfortable degree of interest in the manner of her sibling's death. Thriller, with Robert Wagner, Joanne Woodward, Jeffrey Hunter and Mary Astor

programme.desc: This special extended episode shows what goes into the production of London's newest electric taxi

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: William becomes convinced Mary is involved with Reuben, and arrives at her flat hoping to catch them red-handed - only to discover he has got it all wrong. Unable to cope with the subsequent embarrassment, he ends their relationship and considers selling his business and making a fresh start in New Zealand, but Mary hears of his plans and rushes round, shocking him with a marriage proposal. Will love finally conquer all for the off-on couple? Romantic drama, starring, Martin Clunes, Julie Graham, Paterson Joseph, Cheryl Campbell and Michael Begley
